jurisdiction.description: The regulatory regime governing this artifact. Determines applicable rights, obligations, and compliance conditions.
jurisdiction.x_constraints: GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA, PIPEDA, LGPD, None, Mixed.

retention_policy.basis.description: The rationale determining how long this artifact may be retained.

retention_policy.ttl_days.description: Time-to-live in days for the artifact. Defines retention boundaries enforced by engines and storage layers.

subject_rights.portable.description: Whether the artifact is eligible for portability requests under governing law.

subject_rights.erasable.description: Whether the artifact must be erasable on user request or under statutory obligations.

subject_rights.explainable.description: Whether systems must provide interpretability or explanation when computing with this artifact.

exportability.description: Controls whether the artifact may be exported in .ddna format.

k_anonymity.k.description: Minimum k-anonymity grouping requirement for safe aggregation, export, or research use.

k_anonymity.groups.description: Attribute groups that contribute to anonymity constraints.

policy_labels.description: Classification labels identifying sensitive categories that invoke stricter governance and export limits.
policy_labels.x_constraints: sensitive, children, health, biometrics, financial, none.

masking_rules.description: Redaction requirements for identity, location, or narrative details during display or export.
